content.question: // precondition: x >= 0 public void mystery(int x) { if ((x / 10) != 0) { mystery(x / 10); } System.out.print(x % 10); } Which of the following is printed as a result of the call mystery(123456) ?

choices.label: Many digits are printed due to infinite recursion.

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
